title: cant login!
body:
i am logging in NA server in Hong Kong,
cant log in right now, 
pls be noted, thank you!

replies.body: I'm starting to see a decent number of reports from NA players not being able to reach out login servers. I'm currently talking with some of our techs to see what's going on, but in the mean time go ahead and double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case something might need to be updated!
thank god someone is checking this out cant play at all
Thanks and it's working for me now lol
I'm logging in from Japan. And I have the same issue!
Well I m able to log in again.....

Same case for me {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
Was still playing yesterday...
Did you also have the black screen loading when playing yesterday?
I  didn't have this issue yesterday {{summoner:3}}
